thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: josh

author: josh
title: josh
text:
I ordered my Oakley Crosslink (53) Prescription glasses from Smart Buy Glasses.ca on the 23rd of February.
After I initially ordered, I looked at some of the reviews of the site and got the sickening feeling like this was going to turn into a headache of a transaction in short order.
Wow was I proved wrong!!
Today, on the 12th day, my glasses arrived via FedEx in flawless condition.
I sent two emails during the process to confirm that everything was going ok (there was a slight delay for a few days due to lack of stock) but was informed of the day that they would ship on both emails.
Long story short, very happy customer!!
12 days from the time I ordered to the time they arrived at my door.(including weekends) Very impressive!
For those who claim they have received counterfeit glasses, I thankfully do not share the same experience. I confirmed with Oakley that these are genuine.
Thanks SmartBuyGlasses!
Ill be back for some Oakley Sunglasses for before the summer!
